# We successfully smelted 10 iron plates, and the furnace is now showing that it has no ingredients to smelt. 
# This means we have enough iron plates to craft the burner mining drill.

# Next, we will proceed to craft the burner mining drill using the iron plates we just created.

# 1. Check the recipe for the burner mining drill again to ensure we have all the required materials.
drill_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)

# 2. Ensure we have the necessary materials in our inventory.
ensure_crafting_materials(drill_recipe)

# 3. Now we can craft the burner mining drill.
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)

# 4. Check the inventory after crafting the drill.
print(f"Inventory after crafting burner mining drill: {inspect_inventory()}")
